about_the_game:
Playground

You are a child and want to play with all the equipment on the playground, until you are completely happy.
Play soccer, have a ride on the merry-go-round, seesaw as often as you can, use the slides, swing as often and wildly as you can even doing somersaults.
And if you get bored, call your friends in order to have even more fun!

A gameplay that is funny and easy to understand.
The table offers two plains, many ways and lots of targets that want to be hit.
Many extra balls and multiballs are possible.
Play up to 4 balls at the same time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card
